name: Prize Machine Simulator
description:
Prize Machine Simulator - a simulator of childhood. We all love to pull out the prizes from the machine using the claw.
Work out in our simulator before spending real money in the slot machines with prizes! It is very difficult, but very easy to learn!
Mines of different animals, sell them, that would play again! Accumulate as many different toys! So many kinds of toys! Collect all!
Show your friends and compete who will pull more toys, but be careful, it's not so easy to do!
The uniqueness of the game:
- Lots of different toys.
- Earning money system.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Play with the kids.
- Completely free.
- Up to 90% similarity with slot machines.
- and much more!
Thank you for playing with us, leave your comments and we will try to improve our game as quickly as possible!
